events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience as a developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out to guide you through the process.
We conducted an initial screening to evaluate your skills in software development and your experience level.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions; your enthusiasm for the role is appreciated.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th to discuss your engineering skills in detail.
You completed your technical interview with great feedback from the panel about your problem-solving abilities.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit within the company culture and next steps in the hiring process.
The HR interview went well, and the team is impressed by your communication skills and enthusiasm for the role.
We have prepared an offer for you that reflects your experience and the value we believe you will bring to our engineering team.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer, and we're excited to move forward with you in our team.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you as our newest Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started. We look forward to helping you get comfortable with our systems and team.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially part of our engineering team. Welcome aboard!
